long_description: The X-1 Momentum Sport In-Ear Headphones deliver great sound and a comfortable, secure fit for your music-driven workouts. They are completely sweatproof so you won't ruin them by working hard. Designed with an IPX rating of IP4 to withstand heavy perspiration, these headphones endure all types of weather and can be rinsed after use for a fresh, clean fit. Choice of two included ear-tip sizes allows for a customizable fit that keeps headphones in place during rigorous activities. The X-1 Momentum Sport In-Ear Headphones feature a reflective, tangle-resistant cord that offers extra visibility in low light.
short_description: The X-1 Momentum Sport In-Ear Headphones deliver great sound and a comfortable, secure fit for your music-driven workouts. They are completely sweatproof so you won't ruin them by working hard.
